songs.title: Paisay Da Nasha
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Hoya jadon da Main jawan jagg jang da maidaan
Apne, Paraye, Meray uttay golian chalaan
Mere vaste bache nai koi bhajan de raste
Chhupa phiran guzaran jind Main nashe de aasre
Karan taqreeran, Akhbaaran'ch bayan devan
Nashe'ch Main chovi (24) ghante paisay piche jaan devan
Jail'ch yaar likhan, Yaaran nu tasalian
Qabristan Meray dushmana di galiyan
Paise de nashe ve nashe de pyar'ch
Assi yaaran de dushman tey dushmna de yaar
Maine chhoti ummar tun pehchaan Li 'eh duniya
Vaddeyan shikarian tun sikheya tey suneya
Kay Paisay di ameeri naale dil nu araam
Tay nashe'ch ve vaddi tun vaddi mushkil asaan
Tay pyar, Pyar de ne roop hazaar
'Eh sikheya Main duniya'ch aan de baad!

[Hook]
Paise Da Nasha, Nashe da pyar
Ve tuney sikhya ki duniya'ch aan de baad?
Paise Da Nasha, Nashe da pyar
Ve hondi aadmi di qeemat aadmi de jaan de baad!

Paise Da Nasha, Nashe da pyar
Ve tuney sikhya ki duniya'ch aan de baad?
Paise Da Nasha, Nashe da pyar
Ve hondi aadmi di qeemat aadmi de jaan de baad!

Yeah! Uhh!

Sikhya ki duniya'ch aan de baad?
Aadmi di qeemat aadmi de...

Yeah!
Uhh!

[Verse 2]
Ghaman da khazana hondi zindagi
Ek-do din da fasana hondi zindagi
Ajj Meri vari kal teri zimevari
Kadi rukdi nai sada jari rhendi zindagi
Ghareeb sonde bukhay ameer roti khande
Par aadmi donwei banay Rabb de hathan de
Naale maut kise da Mazhabb nai waikhdi
Jithon vi jande uthay vapis ande sare
Ral-mil Rahoge tay banegi gal
Ve ek-duje naal larna ni masleyan da hal
Jehda beet gya pal oh laut ke ni aana
Jind ve qeemti khazana, Jawana!

[Hook]
Paise Da Nasha, Nashe da pyar
Ve tuney sikhya ki duniya'ch aan de baad?
Paise Da Nasha, Nashe da pyar
Ve hondi aadmi di qeemat aadmi de jaan de baad!

Paise Da Nasha, Nashe da pyar
Ve tuney sikhya ki duniya'ch aan de baad?
Paise Da Nasha, Nashe da pyar
Ve hondi aadmi di qeemat aadmi de jaan de baad!

Yeah!

Sikhya ki duniya'ch aan de baad?
Aadmi di qeemat aadmi de...

Yeah, Yeah, Yeah!

Sikhya ki duniya'ch aan de baad?

[Hook]
Paise Da Nasha, Nashe da pyar
Ve tuney sikhya ki duniya'ch aan de baad?
Paise Da Nasha, Nashe da pyar
Ve hondi aadmi di qeemat aadmi de jaan de baad!
